name: Herpes Zoster Vaccine, Live
strength: The vial contains 0.5ml liquid by dissolution of the lyophilized vaccine with the diluent. The reconstituted vaccine contains not less than 4.3 lgPFU of live varicella-zoster virus and is used for one subjection in a single dose.

name: Rabies Vaccine (Human Diploid Cell) for Human Use, Freeze-dried
strength: 1.0 ml per vial after reconstitution according to the marked amount. The dose for single human use is 1.0 ml, and the titer of rabies vaccine should not be less than 2.5 IU

name: Quadrivalent Subunit Influenza Vaccine
strength: Each pre-filled syringe is 0.5 ml. One human dose is 0.5 ml which should contain 15 µg haemagglutinin of each influenza virus strains.

name: Influenza Vaccine (Split Virion)，Inactivated，Quadrivalent
strength: 0.5 mL single-dose vial / branch

name: Recombinant COVID-19 Vaccine（Adenovirus Type 5 Vector）
strength: 1.5ml/Vial(3 dosages),contains 1.5×10^11VP of Replication-defective Recombinant Human Type 5 Adenovirus Expressing S-protein. 0.5ml is used for single human dose,contains 5×10^10VP of Replication-defective Recombinant Human Type 5 Adenovirus Expressing S-protein.

name: 13-valent Pneumococcal Polysaccharide Conjugate Vaccine (TT/DT)
strength: 0.5 ml/vial, 0.5 ml per human dose, the content of each serotype of pneumococcal polysaccharide is: 1.8 μg for serotype 1, 2.1 μg for serotype 3, 2.1 μg for serotype 4, 1.75 μg for serotype 5, 1.85 μg for serotype 6A, 4.4 μg for serotype 6B, 1.75 μg for serotype 7F, 2.3 μg for serotype 9V, 1.35 μg for serotype 14, 3.65 μg for serotype 18C, 1.6 μg for serotype 19A, 1.25 μg for serotype 19F, and 2.35 μg for serotype 23F.

name: Rabies Vaccine（Vero Cell）for Human Use, Freeze-dried
strength: After reconstitution, the total contents is 0.5ml/vial, The individual dose is 0.5ml, and the Potency of one dose ≥2.5IU

name: Group A and Group C Meningococcal Conjugate Vaccine（CRM197）
strength: 0.5ml/vial after reconstitution according to labeled volume. 0.5ml is used for single human dose, containing 10 ug of conjugate polysaccharide A and 10ug of conjugate polysaccharide C.

name: Haemophilus Influenzae Type b Conjugate Vaccine, Freeze-dried
strength: 0.5 ml/vial after reconstitution, 0.5 ml per human dose, containing the purified Haemophilus Influenzae Type b capsular polysaccharide no less than 10 μg.

name: Japanese Encephalitis Vaccine（Vero Cell）, Inactivated
strength: 0.5mL per vial
marketing: Liaoning Cheng Da Biotechnology Co., Ltd

name: 23-valent Pneumococcal Polysaccharide Vaccine
strength: 0.5ml/vial (syringe), containing purified capsular polysaccharides of 23 pneumococcal types (1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6B, 7F, 8, 9N, 9V, 10A, 11A, 12F, 14, 15B, 17F, 18C, 19F, 19A, 20, 22F, 23F, and 33F), 25 μg per type.

name: Group A and Group C Meningococcal Conjugate Vaccine
strength: Reconstitute as the labelled volume, 0.5ml/vial, each 0.5 ml per human dose, contains 10μg of group A meningococcal polysaccharide and 10ug of group C meningococcal polysaccharide, both conjugated to tetanus toxoid, and 5.0~10.0mg of lactose.

name: Influenza Vaccine (Split Virion), Inactivated, Quadrivalent
strength: Each vial (syringe) contains 0.5 ml. Single dose of 0.5 ml is for adults and children aged over 3 years, containing 15 μg haemagglutinin per type of influenza virus strain.

name: Influenza Vaccine（Split Virion），Inactivated，Quadrivalent
strength: 0.5 ml/vial. One human dose is 0.5 ml, and it contains 15 ug hemagglutinin of each serotype of influenza virus.

name: Influenza Vaccine，Live，Nasal，Freeze-dried
strength: 0.2ml per vial after reconstitution. Single human dose is 0.2ml, the titer of live attenuated viruses including influenza A(H1N1) and influenza A(H3N2) should be not be less than 6.9 lg EID50, and that of live attenuated viruses for influenza B should not be less than 6.4 lg EID50.

name: Diphtheria,Tetanus and Acellular Pertussis Combined Vaccine， Adsorbed
strength: 0.5 ml/vial, 0.5 ml per human dose, containing at least 4.0 IU of acellular pertussis vaccine, 30 IU of diphtheria vaccine, and 40 IU of tetanus vaccine.
